other_tests.procedure_name: CT ABD & PELVIS W & W/O CONTRAST
other_tests.findings: Bibasilar atelectasis, small left pleural effusion, diffuse enlargement of the pancreas with marked peripancreatic fat stranding, mild thickening of the common bile duct wall, numerous calculi in both kidneys, and moderate amount of free fluid in the pelvis.
Mild thickening of the common bile duct wall with associated hyperenhancement likely related to recent ERCP.
